body:
Comment 18 by **rcostu**: 
Sorry about the delay. I had personal issues and I couldn't review the changes on my CL.

I was working to get this done, so if you don't mind I would like to continue working on
it but we could discuss the solution to fix the issues. Or if you have done something
more in depth for this issue or issues 2605 and 3046 you can take it.
